reviews.text:
This water park has become one of my son‚Äôs and my favorite places to spend quality time together! Every visit is packed with fun, laughter, and unforgettable memories. From the exciting water slides to the gentle splash areas perfect for younger kids, there‚Äôs something for everyone, and we always find new ways to enjoy ourselves.

Watching my son‚Äôs face light up as he runs through the water and tries every attraction with such excitement is truly priceless. It‚Äôs a place where we can both let loose, have fun, and build memories that I know we‚Äôll cherish forever.

We‚Äôll definitely be coming back often ‚Äì it‚Äôs a perfect spot for us to enjoy time together and make even more happy memories!

The park just need some maintenance and cleanings done

The water only starts at 930am! Hoping Town Council will put up this information upfront.. so many parents (and kids in swimsuit) came at 8am because that‚Äôs whats written on the website.

And at 930, it‚Äôs only the fountain that flows to the mini lazy river. The water sprays start at 945am.

The rest of the park is amazing, just please manage timing expectations of the water park.

All

Came around 9:30 on this deepavali day. I'm unsure if this crowd is normal, but it's a lot of people. There is a three stall shower area for kids to change. But I don't see any toilet. The playground area is large enough to accommodate plenty of kids, but definitely not the wet area. Anyway, bring lots of water as the vending machine was down. Overall, it was a nice experience

The park itself all is fine. However, not many people are born with BASIC common sense.
Although it‚Äôs a FREE public residence area, the basic common sense in some people to know to remove their god damn footwear when they enter the waterpark area. One of the example in 3rd picture I included.

Also on the day I went, there‚Äôs IRRESPONSIBLE parents who literally just let their kids play without supervising. There‚Äôs literally a sign stating ‚ÄúDO NOT BRING THE SAND FROM THE SAND PIT TO THE WATER PLAY AREA‚Äù

My husband had to stepped up to inform the young kids parents as their kids happily scooping the sand to the water play. ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reason some people don‚Äôt deserve FREE play area.

A great outdoor park for your child to spend their energy, very spacious. It has water play and sands play.

There is a public washroom nearby where you can clean up your child after all the play.

There is also a bbq pit there if you fancy that sort of thing.

Will definitely come back again as my child throughly enjoy it.
